label: comment
tip: A generic comment tagged for geography. Text is Markdown, with preview.

label: references
tip: A set of documental references and/or IDs from external resources.

label: categories
tip: A hierarchic set of categories you can attach to the comment.

label: keywords
tip: A set of keywords you can attach to the comment. Each keyword can belong to a specific index, have a tag to further classify it, and has a language and a value plus an optional note.
